subject: Skiing
World Cup (Skiing)
Fines (Penalties)
lead_paragraph: Christof Innerhofer of Italy earned his first World Cup victory Sunday in the downhill in Bormio, Italy, and the defending champion Bode Miller was fourth despite a possible ploy to get a favorable starting spot.
snippet: Christof Innerhofer of Italy earned his first World Cup victory Sunday in the downhill in Bormio, Italy, and the defending champion Bode Miller was fourth despite a possible ploy to get a favorable starting spot.
